title: DC'd 100 times
body: RIOT plz fix this.. im cant play a game cause i dc'd 100 times whill picking champs.. too anoying..

replies.body:
Let's fix this together! Disconnections that happen in champ select usually occur as a result of a poor connection with the matchmaking servers. I'd like you to configure your local network settings according to our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything is compatible with League.

Let me know if this caused any change.
